p: The plant-derived additives or polymers due to their positive escape gaining importance in recent days and can be utilized as natural thickeners or emulsifiers for the human diet, therefore, act as an alternative to synthetic polymers or additives [ 19]. Moreover, mucilage derived from plants due to their property of elasticity can form a large number of networks molecules, therefore, can be widely used as an edible film or edible coating in food packaging applications in food industries, disintegrants in tablets, application of tablet binders, and several other applications in the pharmaceutical industry [ 11, 94].
